nodes.text: Saruwen Station was a Bengel Shipbuilders XQ2 Platform, operating as a trading post in deep space.
The station was chosen by the Azzameen family as a convenient place for a rendezvous between them and the scout craft Ravenno, representative of a smuggler dealing in black market bacta.

However, the bacta sale was merely a ruse designed by the Loose Cannon pirates, who sought to entrap the Azzameens in an ambush at the cargo transfer area. Fortunately, the family fought their way out of the trap, and returned to their home base, again via Saruwen station.
